name: WARZONE
description: WARZONE is a tactical turn-based war game which requires a chess level of logical thinking and which provides an entertainment comparable to that of a tank shooter.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3   or better Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GT 450 1GB / ATI HD 7770 1GB or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
